Issue.creator: andrey.goncharov
Issue.summary: Make sure indy and sovrin packages are never automatically updated
Issue.description: During an install (postinst script in deb?) we need to use "apt hold" to make sure that indy-* and sovrin packages are never automatically installed by a general apt upgrade command; they should only be updated by a POOL_UPGRADE or by a manual apt upgrade that specifically names them.
